data.similar:
Re-implements and expands upon a small subset of Module::Build's
    functionality.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module will provide a tool-independent and
    platform-independent interface for invoking any compiler/linker for
    building Perl extensions and other libraries. It is intended to be
    used by other modules such as Module::Build.

    Initial static diagram of primary modules/classes can be seen at
    <http://www.thepierianspring.org/perl/ExtUtils/PCC/class.gif>. Other
    documentation and diagrams will appear shortly at
    <http://www.thepierianspring.org/perl/ExtUtils/PCC/>.
